Hi All,

I generated a report using JUnitreport task. I found that the report
generated was not sufficient in term of description of test case. The
report just gives testname, result and time. Is there any way by which i
can some more information about the test like input values, expected
result, description of test case.

Thanks for your help.

Devendra.
subject: How to more description in JUnitreport
